short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Always appear online in Slack, hide when you're typing, and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Appear always online with a green status!

Hide the red notification dot on your tabs when you have new notifications.

Prevent others from seeing when you're typing.

Install this extension to add new customization to Slack in Chrome.
